content.rendered:
Aimee and Joel celebrate their nuptials with an elegant, lush wedding at The Bridge Building.

Blush draping from Quest Events and a ring of greenery by Forget Me Not Designs filled the rooftop with an unforgettable ambiance. Not to mention, the open view of downtown Nashville.

Following a dreamy ceremony, guests headed downstairs to snack on some passed app favorites. All of which included crispy herbed risotto balls, french fry shooters, fried green tomatoes, brisket tacos, chicken and waffles, and bacon-wrapped shrimp. But the yummy food didn't end there!

A buffet of green beans, brussel sprouts, roasted corn and tomato risotto, fried chicken, bourbon-glazed salmon and a baked potato station were all available for guests to peruse.

While white linens, chandeliers, and fall florals transformed the main space into a total mood, guests quickly found their seats to prepare for dinner.

After finishing their meals, guests headed back up to the rooftop for some traditional wedding celebrations and to dance the night away.

Keep scrolling for elegant decor and lush floral wedding inspiration.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: October 5, 2019
Bride & Groom: Aimee and Joel
Location: The Bridge Building
Guest Count: 158
Colors: Maroon, Navy & Gold
Photographer: Whitney Cadavid
Florist: Forget Me Not Designs
Paper Goods: Dear Addie
Linens: Music City Tents
Calligraphy: White Ink Calligraphy
Lounge Furniture: Spark Vintage
Draping: Quest Events
DJ: 3rd Coast Entertainment
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Lighting: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: Lauren & Megan | IH

excerpt.rendered: An elegant fall wedding ceremony and reception with lush florals at The Bridge Building.
